revision.text: Possibly: The Elements of Commerce, Politics and Finances, In Three Treatises on those important Subjects. Designed as a Supplement to the Education of British Youth, after they quit the public Universities or private Academies. By Thomas Mortimer, Esq. (London : Printed for the Author....MDCCLXXII. [1772]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2051757~S1
